petclinic.dao

接口 ClinicDAO

  • 所有已知实现类:
    ClinicJdbcDAO

    public interface ClinicDAO
    The high-level petclinic Data Access Object interface.
    作者:
    Ken Krebs

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      Owner findOwner(int id)
      Method to retrieve an Owner from the datastore by id.
      java.util.List findOwners(java.lang.String lastName)
      Method to retrieve Owners from the datastore by last name.
      java.util.List findPets(Owner owner)
      Method to retrieve Pets from the datastore belonging to a particular Owner.
      java.util.List findVetSpecialties(int vetId)
      Method to retrieve all specialties from the datastore for a particular Vet.
      java.util.List findVisits(Pet pet)
      Method to retrieve Visits from the datastore for a particular Pet.
      java.util.List getSpecialties()
      Method to retrieve all Vet specialties from the datastore.
      java.util.List getTypes()
      Method to retrieve all Pet types from the datastore.
      java.util.List getVets()
      Method to retrieve all Vets from the datastore.
      void insert(Owner owner)
      Method to add a new Owner to the datastore.
      void insert(Pet pet)
      Method to add a new Pet to the datastore.
      void insert(Visit visit)
      Method to add a new Visit to the datastore.
      void update(Owner owner)
      Method to update the datastore with an Owner's revised information.
      void update(Pet pet)
      Method to update the datastore with a Pet's revised information.

        java.util.List findOwners(java.lang.String lastName)
                   throws com.interface21.dao.DataAccessException
        Method to retrieve Owners from the datastore by last name.
        参数:
        lastName - Value to search for.
        返回:
        a List of matching Owners.

        com.interface21.dao.DataAccessException

         throws com.interface21.dao.DataAccessException
        Method to retrieve an Owner from the datastore by id.
        参数:
        id - Value to search for.
        返回:
        the Owner if found.
        抛出:
        com.interface21.dao.DataAccessException
